title: BRIEF-Appsvillage Australia Says Co Expanded Facebook Advertising Offering To Multiple Emerging Markets
text:
BRIEF-Appsvillage Australia Says Co Expanded Facebook Advertising Offering To Multiple Emerging Markets

Stock Markets 2 hours ago (Sep 24, 2019 04:41)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Appsvillage Australia Says Co Expanded Facebook Advertising Offering To Multiple Emerging Markets Sept 24 (Reuters) - Appsvillage Australia Ltd : * EXPANDED ITS FACEBOOK ADVERTISING OFFERING TO A RANGE OF EMERGING MARKETS INCLUDING PHILIPPINES, INDIA, MALAYSIA

BRIEF-Appsvillage Australia Says Co Expanded Facebook Advertising Offering To Multiple Emerging Markets
